author: craigmcc
msg: Rebuild version of "moo.jar" that eliminates the JDK 1.2 dependency in
the source code originally called add() instead of addElement() on a
Vector, which is only legal in JDK 1.2.
The source code had been fixed, but a rebuilt moo.jar had not been checked
in.  This caused watchdog to fail on the first series of tests, on the
